note:
Born on a mountain top in Tennessee, in a two-seater outhouse, that I built with my own two hands.

Teacher. Lore keeper. Science believer. Realist, but out of hopeful green stuff woven.

Also: Gamer. Neuro-spicy. Hobbyist cook. Tech-adjacent Luddite. Critter enthusiast. Cat shepherd. Recovering academic (PhD, 19th-Century American Literature).
